title: Strengthening Business Competencies: Mathematics Concepts via Flipped Learning-Based Digital Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Computation Skills and Digital Device Usage Experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain mathematical concepts (calculus/basic statistics) with 80% or higher comprehension through digital content (videos, interactive modules) provided in a flipped learning environment

Learners can create one or more applicable mathematical models for real-world business scenarios (budget analysis, resource optimization) using digital storytelling techniques in a VR simulation environment
Through team-based project assessments, learners can complete storytelling-based mathematical solution proposals incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
